indexer.label: Lucene Search Engine
indexer.description: Zend_Search_Lucene implementation to index all files and search a whole repository quickly.

param.name: index_content
param.label: Index Content
param.description: Parses the file when possible and index its content (see plugin global options)

param.name: index_meta_fields
param.label: Index Meta Fields
param.description: Which additionnal fields to index and search

param.name: repository_specific_keywords
param.label: Repository keywords
param.description: If your repository path is defined dynamically by specific keywords like AJXP_USER, or your own, mention them here.

global_param.name: PARSE_CONTENT_MAX_SIZE
global_param.label: Parse Content Until
global_param.description: Skip content parsing and indexation for files bigger than this size (must be in Bytes)

global_param.name: PARSE_CONTENT_HTML
global_param.label: HTML files
global_param.description: List of extensions to consider as HTML file and parse content

global_param.name: PARSE_CONTENT_TXT
global_param.label: Text files
global_param.description: List of extensions to consider as Text file and parse content
